ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีีกีทีกีฉีกีฒีซ ีทึีปีกีถีซ ิฑีฒีกีพีถีธ ีฐีกีดีกีตีถึีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึีจ ีดีซีถีนึ ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 25-ีจ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฐีฅีผีกีถีกีถ ีฃีตีธึีฒีซึ: ิฒีฅึีฑีธึีซ ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีจ ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีซีถ ีฐีกีถีฑีถีฅีฌีธึึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีถึีกีถึ ีฏีตีกีถึีจ ีฃีตีธึีฒีธึีด ีพีฟีกีถีฃีพีกีฎ ีฏีฌีซีถีซ, ีฃีตีธึีฒีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึีซีถ ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 5-ีซีถ ีฆีฃีธึีทีกึึีฅีฌ ีง ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีฟีกึีกีฎึีกีตีซีถ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีดีกีถ ึ ีฅีถีฉีกีฏีกีผีธึึีพีกีฎึีถีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีกึีกึ ีีกีตีฏ ิฝีกีถีธึีดีตีกีถีจ: ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีถ ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 6-ีซีถ ีฅีฒีฅีฌ ีง ิฑีฒีกีพีถีธีตีธึีด, ีฆึีธึึีฅีฌ ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึ ีฐีฅีฟึ

entry.title: Fallout from Azerbaijanโs Karabakh incursions continues

media:group.media:title: Fallout from Azerbaijanโs Karabakh incursions continues
media:group.media:description:
The fallout continues from Azerbaijanโs recent incursions into Armenian-controlled parts of Karabakh, which left two Armenian servicemen dead and 19 injured. The Artsakh Defence Army reported that, though the situation is now relatively calm, Azerbaijani forces did violate the ceasefire regime along some sections of the line of contact.

entry.title: Resetting the relationship between Armenia and the diaspora

media:group.media:title: Resetting the relationship between Armenia and the diaspora
media:group.media:description:
Tigrane Yegavian, an author and journalist, sat down with CivilNet to discuss the historical background of Armenia-diaspora relations and what opportunities were missed in the last (?) few decades. Yegavian also talks about how the media, politics and the education system can help narrow the gap between Armenia and the diaspora.
